mapper.sql: id, type, starttime, endtime, reason, userid, username, isfinish, createtime
mapper.select: select * from leaves order by createtime desc

select
from leaves where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by createtime desc
mapper.insert:

type,

mapper.update:
update leaves
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isfinish = #{isfinish,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update leaves set type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isfinish = #{isfinish,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
